com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class TaskPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.TaskPane

  • public class TaskPane
extends java.lang.Object
    A task pane to execute several tasks.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
